name: The Grenade Rolled Down the Hill
name_original: The Grenade Rolled Down the Hill
description:
A small, stupid piece inspired by Idle Thumbs and emergent gameplay systems.

WASD to control the grenades angular velocity and the small black pip.

VO: Idle Thumbs 302: The Stupidity and the Grandeur (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gWbq-7SoMAE)
Music: The Band - Theme from The Last Waltz
